raw_body: Beloved husband of Delanie, loving father of Ruksheen and Ruwendra, Father-in-law of Milinda and Ganguli, precious grandfather of Minuki, Mineth, Rizani and Gihen. Brother of Rohini, late Ranjela, Ramya, Rose, Ramona and Ravindra.Cortege leaves residence 18/20, Domingo De Mel Mw, St. Peter’s Road, Moratuwa on 23 rd April 2024 at 3.30pm for service and burial at St. Sebastian’s Church Cemetery.
